Dialogue.NPCText: Hey new roommate, we're moving in this weekend! You excited??
Dialogue.PlayerReplyA: Hell yeah! Its gonna be great!
Dialogue.PlayerReplyB: Um…sure, I guess, I'm not really sure what to make of this whole thing.
Dialogue.PlayerReplyC: Ugh, not really…I'm not gonna like moving out of here.
Dialogue.PlayerReplyD: Hell yeah! Its gonna be great!

Dialogue.NPCText: Its crazy, moving into a new place, but its gonna be awesome. :D By the way, I may not be here when you get here, because my friend Shaun's having a party that evening.
Dialogue.PlayerReplyA: That's cool, means I'll be able to get a hang of things while you're out.
Dialogue.PlayerReplyB: Its all good, no problem, I'll see you when I see you then.
Dialogue.PlayerReplyC: Alright…well, you'll have to show me whatever I can't figure out/find when you get back or something.
Dialogue.PlayerReplyD: Alright…well, you'll have to show me whatever I can't figure out/find when you get back or something.

Dialogue.NPCText: I'm sorry dude, well I'm sure once you get here we can kick back, and you'll feel right at home. :) By the way, I may not be here when you get here, because my friend Shaun's having a party that evening.
Dialogue.PlayerReplyA: That's cool, means I'll be able to get a hang of things while you're out.
Dialogue.PlayerReplyB: Its all good, no problem, I'll see you when I see you then.
Dialogue.PlayerReplyC: Alright…well, you'll have to show me whatever I can't figure out/find when you get back or something.
Dialogue.PlayerReplyD: Alright…well, you'll have to show me whatever I can't figure out/find when you get back or something.

Dialogue.NPCText: OH, I FORGOT TO TELL YOU. I hooked us up a nice 42" TV up in our common space. :D
Dialogue.PlayerReplyB: Cool. So, like can I hook my stuff up to it?
Dialogue.PlayerReplyC: Sweet! So I can use it too?
Dialogue.PlayerReplyD: You're not gonna be up on it all hours of the night are you…?

Dialogue.NPCText: HELL YEAH ITS 1080p! Highest resolution I could find. It'll be sweet for games and movies and stuff :D our pad will be a party pad!
Dialogue.PlayerReplyA: Sweeeeet. I am excite for move in tomorrow.
Dialogue.PlayerReplyB: Coo. How about a fridge, is there one in the common space?
Dialogue.PlayerReplyC: Sweeeeet. I am excite for move in tomorrow.
Dialogue.PlayerReplyD: Hopefully not too much of a party pad hahaa…

Dialogue.NPCText: Yeah! Of course! What's mine if yours, just take good care of it. You break it you replace it, bu other than that yep, sharing is caring haha.
Dialogue.PlayerReplyA: Sweeeeet. I am excite for move in tomorrow.
Dialogue.PlayerReplyB: Coo. How about a fridge, is there one in the common space?
Dialogue.PlayerReplyC: Sweeeeet. I am excite for move in tomorrow.

Dialogue.NPCText: Oh, no, don't worry, I mean, I kinda party sometimes, but if you don't want I'll try to keep it out of our place. No worries.
Dialogue.PlayerReplyA: Okay :) Cool. Not sure I'm quite up to crazy loudness haha.

Dialogue.NPCText: THERE IS ALSO A FRIDGE. BOOM. WE HAVE THE ABILITY TO CHILL THINGS!
Dialogue.PlayerReplyC: Awesome, one less thing to have to worry about.
Dialogue.PlayerReplyD: How big is the freezer? I've got plans to buy lots of ice cream :D

Dialogue.NPCText: It is big enough for you to just buy ALL of the ice cream(as long as you share :P )
Super excited for tomorrow! See you then!(or rather, I won't see you) but yeah! Talk to you later! I gotta go take care of some things for the party tomorrow.
